name: SPYRAL MISSION - Assault
text: Destroy this card during your 3rd End Phase after activation. Once per turn, if a "SPYRAL" monster you control destroys a monster by battle, or if you destroy a card(s) on the field with a "SPYRAL" monster's effect you control: You can draw 1 card. You can banish this card from your Graveyard; Special Summon 1 "SPYRAL" monster from your hand.
